SELECT b.*, avg(r.rating) rating FROM STEP_BOOK b left join step_rating r on b.id = r.book_id WHERE 1=1
AND (b.book_name ILIKE #{pattern} or array_to_string(b.keywords, ',') ILIKE #{pattern})
and b.status = 'ONLINE' group by b.id

SELECT b.*, avg(r.rating) rating FROM STEP_BOOK b inner join STEP_BOOK_CATEGORY_REF c on b.id = c.book_id left join step_rating r on b.id = r.book_id WHERE c.category_id = #{categoryID} and b.status = 'ONLINE' group by b.id ORDER BY b.created_at DESC

SELECT b.*, AVG(r.rating) rating FROM STEP_BOOK b inner join STEP_RATING r on b.id = r.book_id inner join STEP_BOOK_CATEGORY_REF c on b.id = c.book_id WHERE c.category_id = #{categoryID} and b.status = 'ONLINE' group by b.id order by rating desc

SELECT b.*, count(1) count_num, AVG(r.rating) rating FROM STEP_BOOK b inner join STEP_VIEW_HISTORY v on b.id = v.book_id inner join STEP_BOOK_CATEGORY_REF c on b.id = c.book_id left join step_rating r on b.id = r.book_id WHERE c.category_id = #{categoryID} and b.status = 'ONLINE' group by b.id order by count_num desc

SELECT b.*, AVG(r.rating) rating FROM STEP_BOOK b inner join STEP_BOOK_CATEGORY_REF c on b.id = c.book_id left join step_rating r on b.id = r.book_id WHERE c.category_id = #{categoryID} and b.status = 'ONLINE' group by b.id ORDER BY b.CREATED_AT DESC
